snippet: Workers at the power plant who were installing wire nets to keep rats away from a cooling system instead tripped that system, causing it to fail for the second time in weeks.
abstract: Workers at Japan's stricken Fukushima nuclear power plant who were installing wire nets to keep rats away from vital cooling system instead tripped system, causing it to fail for second time in weeks.
lead_paragraph: Workers at the power plant who were installing wire nets to keep rats away from a cooling system instead tripped that system, causing it to fail for the second time in weeks.

headline.seo: Rat Chase Again Bedevils Fukushima Nuclear Plant
headline.main: Rat Chase Backfires at Reactor in Japan
headline.print_headline: Rat Chase Backfires At Reactor In Japan
